thread.title: Turning GE’s Sacred Cows Into Hamburger

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Turning GE’s Sacred Cows Into Hamburger
text:
What a difference a year makes at General Electric.
This time in 2017 the company’s share price was $28, its quarterly dividend was 24 cents and its CEO was the cocksureJeff Immelt. Now its price and dividend are half as much and methodical boss John Flannery is struggling to pare down the conglomerate. Those first two are unequivocally bad news. The third may not be.
Mr....
